      • addActivityPreference

        protected void addActivityPreference(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.Class<?> activityClass)
        Add a Preference that launches a specified Activity, passing in the preference key as an extra. For ease of use, extend AbstractPreferenceActivity for the Activity to launch

      • addActivityPreference

        protected void addActivityPreference(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         int imageResource,
                         java.lang.Class<?> activityClass)
        Add a Preference that launches a specified Activity, passing in the preference key as an extra. For ease of use, extend AbstractPreferenceActivity for the Activity to launch

      • addHeadTiltPreference

        protected void addHeadTiltPreference(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String title)
        Add a Preference that allows the user to specify head tilt. The value put into the preference is an acceleration in meters/second^2 along Glass's Z axis.

      • addHeadTiltPreference

        protected void addHeadTiltPreference(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         int imageResource)
        Add a Preference that allows the user to specify head tilt. The value put into the preference is an acceleration in meters/second^2 along Glass's Z axis.
